data.title: Public transport
data.meta_description: Fast and convenient: BER is very well connected to public transport in Berlin and surrounding areas.
data.text:
The airport station "Flughafen BER" (BER Airport) is located directly under Terminal 1 on level U2. From here you can reach the T1 check-in hall in just a few minutes. If you are flying from T2, please proceed to arrivals level E0 and follow the signs to T2 from there.

Airport Express (FEX)

Route: Berlin (Hauptbahnhof - Gesundbrunnen - Ostkreuz) - BER Airport

Frequency: every 30 minutes between Berlin Central Station and BER

Onwards from BER Airport as RB24: Blankenfelde - Dahlewitz - Rangsdorf - Dabendorf - Zossen - Wünsdorf/Waldstadt

Frequency: every hour

Onwards from BER Airport as RB32: Birkengrund - Ludwigsfelde

Frequency: every hour

RE8

Route: Wismar - Wittenberge - Neustadt (Dosse) - Nauen - Berlin (Spandau - Zoologischer Garten - Hauptbahnhof - Friedrichstraße - Alexanderplatz - Ostbahnhof - Ostkreuz) - BER Airport

Frequency: every hour (24h operation between Berlin-City and BER)

RB22

Strecke: Potsdam (Griebnitzsee - Hauptbahnhof - Park Sanssouci - Golm) - Saarmund - Ludwigsfelde - BER Airport - Königs Wusterhausen

Frequency: every hour

RB23

Strecke: Potsdam (Golm - Hauptbahnhof) - Berlin (Wannsee - Charlottenburg - Zoologischer Garten - Hauptbahnhof - Friedrichstraße - Alexanderplatz - Ostbahnhof - Ostkreuz) - BER Airport

Frequency: every hour

RB24 Nord

(Eberswalde Hauptbahnhof - Melchow - Biesenthal - Rüdnitz - Bernau - Berlin-Hohenschöhnhausen) - Berlin (Lichtenberg - Ostkreuz - Schöneweide) - S Schönefeld Bhf. (Transfer to BER Airport via S-Bahn S9/45)

Frequency: every hour

RB24 Süd

Wündsdorf-Waldstadt - BER Airport

Frequency: every hour.

RB32

Oranienburg - Berlin (Hohenschönhausen - Lichtenberg - Ostkreuz - Schöneweide) - S Schönefeld Bhf. (Transfer to BER Airport via S-Bahn S9/45)

Frequency: every hour

Note: From 16.09. (Mon), approx. 4 am to 08.11. (Fri), 1:30 am, the S-Bahn lines S9 and S45 will not run to BER Airport. You can find more information here: S-Bahn Berlin

The airport station "Flughafen BER" (BER Airport) is located directly under Terminal 1 on level U2. From here you can reach the T1 check-in hall in just a few minutes. If you are flying from T2, please proceed to arrivals level E0 and follow the signs to T2 from there.

S9

Tracks 5/6

Route: Berlin (Spandau - Charlottenburg - Zoologischer Garten - Hauptbahnhof - Friedrichstraße - Alexanderplatz - Ostbahnhof - Warschauer Straße - Treptower Park - Schöneweide - Adlershof) - S Schönefeld Bhf. - BER Airport

Frequency: every 20 minutes

S45

Tracks 5/6

Route: Berlin (Südkreuz - Schöneweide - Adlershof) - S Schönefeld Bhf. - BER Airport

Frequency: every 20 minutes

The express buses depart from bus stops A 2 resp. A 6-7. These can be found on the arrivals level (E0) of Terminal 1; directly in front of the building.

X7

Route: U Rudow - BER Airport (Bus stops A 6-7)

Frequency: every 5-10 minutes

X71

Route: U Alt-Mariendorf - Johannisthaler Chaussee - U Rudow - BER Airport (Bus stops A 6-7)

Frequency: every 20 minutes

BER2 (subject to a surcharge)

Route: Potsdam Central station - BER Airport (Bus stop A 2)

Frequency: 16 times a day

Travel time: approx. 55 minutes

Ticket can be purchased only on the bus

Further information: www.berairportshuttle.de

The airport station "Flughafen BER" (BER Airport) is located directly under Terminal 1 on level U2. From here you can reach the T1 check-in hall in just a few minutes. If you are flying from T2, please proceed to arrivals level E0 and follow the signs to T2 from there.

Intercity Chemnitz – BER Airport – Rostock

Route: Chemnitz - Dresden – Elsterwerda – BER Airport – Berlin Südkreuz – Berlin Hauptbahnhof – Oranienburg – Rostock

Frequency: several times daily

Note: between Berlin central station and Oranienburg, the IC can also be used with VBB tickets

Timetable: www.bahn.de

If you arrive by bus, which only goes to "S Schönefeld Bhf.", please change there to the S-Bahn lines S9/45 to get to BER Airport. Buses travelling to BER Airport arrive on the arrivals level (E0) in front of Terminal 1.

163

Route: S Schöneweide - S Adlershof - S Grünau - S Schönefeld Bhf.

Frequency: every 20 minutes

Continue to Terminals 1-2 with the S-Bahn lines S9/S45

164

Route: S Köpenick - S Adlershof - S Schönefeld Bhf.

Frequency: every 20 minutes

Continue to Terminals 1-2 with the S-Bahn lines S9/S45

171

Route: U Hermannplatz - S Sonnenallee - S+U Neukölln - U Grenzallee - U Rudow - S Schönefeld Bhf.

Frequency: every 20 minutes

Continue to Terminals 1-2 with the S-Bahn lines S9/S45

263

Route: S Grünau - BER Airport (Bus stop A 3)

Frequency: every 60 minutes

743

Route: S Lichtenrade - S Waßmannsdorf (you can change here to S9/45 to BER Airport)

Frequency: every 60 minutes

744

Route: Gropiusstadt, Gesundheitszentrum - Großziethen - U Rudow - S Schönefeld Bhf.

Frequency: every 20 minutes

Continue to Terminals 1-2 with the S-Bahn lines S9/S45

If you arrive by bus, which only goes to S Schönefeld Bhf., please change there to the S-Bahn lines S9/45 to get to BER Airport. Buses travelling to Terminals 1-2 arrive on the arrivals level (E0) in front of Terminal 1.

735

Route: Königs Wusterhausen - A10 Center - Wildau - BER Airport (Bus stop A 3)

Frequency: every hour

736

Route: Königs Wusterhausen - S Wildau - BER Airport (Bus stop A 4)

Frequency: every hour

743

Route: S Lichtenrade - S Waßmannsdorf (you can change here to S9/45 to BER Airport)

Frequency: every hour

744

Route: Gesundheitszentrum - U Lipschitzallee - Großziethen - U Rudow - S Schönefeld Bhf.

Frequency: every 20 minutes

Continue to Terminals 1-2 with the S-Bahn lines S9/S45

Night buses depart from bus stops A 4 resp. A 6-7. These can be found on the arrivals level (E0) of Terminal 1; directly in front of the building.

N7

Route: U Rathaus Spandau - U Hermannplatz - U Rudow - S Schönefeld Bhf. - BER Airport (Bus stops A 6-7)

Frequency: every 30 minutes

Note: On weekends the N7 only runs between U Rudow and BER.

N7X

Route: S+U Zoologischer Garten - U Berliner Straße - U Alt-Tempelhof - S Schönefeld Bhf. - BER Airport (Bus stops A 6-7)

Frequency: every 15 minutes

The N7X supplements the early morning service on weekdays as an express bus from S+U Zoologischer Garten via Bundesallee, Schöneberg and Tempelhof to BER Airport.

N36

Route: Königs Wusterhausen - Wildau - BER Airport (Bus stop A 4)

Frequency: every hour

N60

Route: S+U Alexanderplatz - S Treptower Park - S Schönefeld Bhf. - BER Airport (Bus stops A 6-7)

Frequency: every 30 minutes
